group_1.textRight: Oh, Coooordinatooor!

group_1.textLeft: Yeeeeees?
Oh, Felicia!@[chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]And you've brought a fresh face with you.

group_1.textRight: Sure have! This here's...uh...@[chara:100501:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]Who are you, anyway?
You're askin' me this now...?@Well I guess I haven't told you my name...
Kyoko Sakura.@Nice to meet ya.

group_1.textLeft: The pleasure is mine, Kyoko.
I'm Mitama Yakumo.

group_1.textRight: Cool. So your flyer said somethin'@about there bein' free food?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah, you're here for that!

group_1.textRight: (Why else would we be here?)

group_1.textLeft: What a relief! I didn't think@anyone would show up today!

group_1.textRight: So what? You're closin' up for the day?

group_1.textLeft: Oh no, I'm about to start cooking!

group_1.textRight: Awesome! @My stomach's going, "Grrr feed meh!"

group_1.textLeft: Good, because I'm going to@fill you full of deliciousness!

group_1.narration: Wait, who holds a knife like that?!
I said be careful!@Do ya wanna eat your own finger?!

group_1.textLeft: The knife just came flyin' at me...@This is scarier than fightin' a Witch...[chara:100501:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]

group_1.textRight: [chara:200601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]How the heck did it get stuck in the ceiling?
...What were you even tryin' to make, Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: The best meat and potato stew...ever?

group_1.textRight: ...Well, you've managed to pick@the right ingredients, so there's that...
I just don't ever want to@see you holdin' a knife again...
She's more than clumsy...@She's a lethal weapon in human skin...

group_1.textLeft: I'm standing right here, you know.

group_1.textRight: Yeah well, you almost killed us all, so...
Anyway, what do we do now?
I can take care of these! I just need@one of those pshew-pshew thingies.

group_1.textLeft: A peeler? I have one.

group_1.textRight: Okay Blondie, you peel.@I'll chop...
(Hang on a sec...somethin's not right@here... I came for a free meal...)
A-ha. It all makes sense now...
The local Magical Girls must know @how bad  you are at cookin'.

group_1.textLeft: I really thought I was close to improving...

group_1.textRight: [chara:200601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]You and I have very different@definitions of the word "close."

group_1.textLeft: Oh my. You're pretty blunt...

group_1.textRight: Okay, that takes care of the prep work.

group_1.textLeft: Wow! You're crazy Red Head!@You were like bjoom-pshaw! Done!

group_1.textRight: Well, I spend a lot of my time@slicin' and dicin' Witches.
It may not be so pretty, but @choppin' things up is my forte.

group_1.textLeft: Now it's my turn!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'll leave the seasonin' to you.
Make it tasty!

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry, I'm going to put@a lot of love into this one!

group_1.textRight: Right!@I'm gonna go buy some food...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, why?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:200601:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Are you kiddin' me?!
I've never seen anythin' like this!
[chara:200601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Who uses [textRed:PAINT] as a seasoning?!

group_1.textLeft: I just thought it would look better@if it were a bit more...brown...
We were so close, but now it's all ruined...

group_1.textRight: Seriously...
